item.title: Senate Majority Leader John Thune Riding High, for Now, Amid Cabinet Confirmation Spree
item.description: ‘He’s definitely honored his promise to us that it’s going to be a far more collaborative conference,’ Senator Ron Johnson said.

item.title: Andrew Cuomo Is Precisely the Wrong Answer to Trump
item.description: If Democrats hope to establish a contrast with Trump, they could not pick a worse standard-bearer than New York’s former governor.

item.title: Trump Agency Heads Ignore Musk’s Ultimatum to Federal Employees, in Farcical Episode
item.description: Yet by making clear that Musk’s power is limited, it could help DOGE in court.

item.title: The Hell of Antisemitism
item.description: A torrent of evil continues to be unleashed on Jews.

item.title: The Evil of Palestinian Terrorism Reaches New Depths
item.description: In the final week of a precarious cease-fire, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu faces a major decision.
